Description: No stinging cells, recently thought to be sister to all other animals
Aquatic simple animals. no true tissues
Evolved from bilateral animals, now pentaradial
Presence of a notochord, also closed circulatory system and ceolom
Top and bottom valve, unlike molluscan bivalves
Have either a trochophote larvae stage or a lophophore
Only have a notocord in the larval stage. Previously called urochordates
